description: It was such a terrible experience
title: Managing your Menstruation can be really easy
content:
“It happened in class with all my classmates around. I stood up to go to the toilet. Then I realized I had stained my dress. Oh, it was such a terrible experience. I was so embarrassed. My friends helped me, but I spent the whole week at home."

[Sexuality Facts][1]

[Take Action!][2]
